comment.author: 21647809@N04
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/27331537@N06] I think every school in the state had a demountable like this! Neither the classroom at my wife's school nor mine featured the tank - we didn't need a tank we lived in the city! (in retrospect we probably did, but I won't start that debate here!) I think we had two - it was growing suburb. 
I'd put the date in the 1950s
